alert.note: Alert for Adams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 12:21AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT......The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers... Ohio Brush Creek near West Union. Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio Brush Creek near West Union. * WHEN...Through early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Water continues to spill onto Route 348, while several county or township roads near Lawshe and low areas east of West Union near the creek are flooded. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1210 AM EST, . - - the stage was 18.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning and continue falling to 3.6 feet early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet.
